item.title: [Sharing] 2019 CSC Cyber Security Competition Finals - All-You-Can-Eat McDonald's ฅ'ω'ฅ
item.description: Long time no post, just tidying up this dusty blog a bit (laughs) I’ve been in the security lab for three months without realizing it… And this CSC (Cyber Security Competition) was my first on-site cybersecurity competition!
